definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: I will graduate from eking University this July. I have majored in accounting.
sentences.chinese: 今年七月將從北京大學畢業，我主修的專業是會計學。

sentences.english: I graduated from Guilin Institute, majoring in the professional practice of international trade.
sentences.chinese: 我畢業於桂林山水學院，主修的是國際貿易實務專業。

sentences.english: Your major and minor don't matter.
sentences.chinese: 你的主修科目和輔修科目不重要。

sentences.english: I majored in classical voice and art and minored in dance and drama.
sentences.chinese: 我主修古典聲樂和藝術，輔修舞蹈和舞劇。

sentences.english: One was a college student in faraway Sichuan province, majoring in petroleum.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個是四川某大學的畢業生，主修石油加工專業。

sentences.english: B: I majored in English and minored in Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 我主修英語，其次是漢語。

sentences.english: The need for students majoring in crop and soil sciences is growing.
sentences.chinese: 對主修作物和土壤學的學生的需求量正在逐漸增加。

sentences.english: Kudrow graduated from exclusive American college Vassar , where she gained a major in biology.
sentences.chinese: 庫卓畢業於貴族大學瓦瑟學院，主修科目是生物學。

sentences.english: I come from HUST, majoring in foreign linguistics and applied linguistics.
sentences.chinese: 我來自華中科技大學，主修外國語言學及應用語言學。

sentences.english: I still have to fill 16 hours in my major.
sentences.chinese: 我必須重修主修科目16小時。

sentences.english: Now that there are peasant associations, the landlords can be bluntly ordered to repair the embankments.
sentences.chinese: 有了農會，可以不客氣地發命令強迫地主修塘壩了。

sentences.english: He majors in civil engineering in a technical institute.
sentences.chinese: 他在一所工學院主修民用建築。

sentences.english: I haven't marry, and I still a student. I major in Japanese in XX University.
sentences.chinese: 目前未婚還是個學生，就讀於xx大學主修日文。

sentences.english: University degree and above in English or normal English.
sentences.chinese: 大學及以上，主修英語或者師範英語。

sentences.english: B. Ed and B. BA in National Chengchi University; Major in Education and Management Information Systems.
sentences.chinese: 國立政治大學教育學系，資訊管理系雙主修。

sentences.english: We once majored in English and management.
sentences.chinese: 我們曾主修英語和管理。

definition: to major (in a field)/to study a specialty to obtain a higher degree
(at a school) to take as an elective/an elective/elective (subject)
to switch from one major or faculty to another (at a university)
to be proficient in/to master (a subject)
doctoral degree/PhD/same as Doctor of Philosophy 哲學博士學位|哲学博士学位
to undertake advanced studies/to take a refresher course
